gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Warriors 115, Hornets 97
gameRecap.excerpt: Golden State defeats Charlotte, 115-97. For Golden State, Stephen Curry led the way with 23 points and four assists while aided by Andrew Wiggins (20 points, eight rebounds, eight assists) and Trayce Jackson-Davis (18 points, eight rebounds, three blocks) in the victory. Miles Bridges finished with 22 points and nine rebounds with Davis Bertans adding 14 points (four 3PM) for Charlotte in the losing effort. Golden State improves to 39-34, while Charlotte moves to 18-55 in the loss.
